about_the_game:
Safety, flexibility and comfort. This is how the manufacturer MAN advertises his Interurban Lion's Intercity LE bus. This bus now also finds its way as a virtual version into OMSI 2, the omnibus simulator.

The MAN Lion's Intercity LE is a real all-rounder and comes here in different variants. Its production start in reality was in the first quarter of 2022, so it is a very new bus.

It can be used for intercity transport, where it connects cities and suburbs with the surrounding countryside. This version has customized seats as well as luggage trays. It is also used for shuttle services and, last but not least, for school bus transport. a version with double doors in the boarding area is available. The city bus version has adapted seats and no luggage racks. A MAN driver's workplace was authentically implemented for the model.

The MAN Lion's Intercity LE is a high-floor bus, but only from the second door. In the front area it is a low-floor bus and thus provides comfortable boarding for passengers. This OMSI vehicle extension contains the MAN Lion's Intercity LE in different lengths.

Its modular system allows different seating arrangements up to space for wheelchairs, baby carriages or standing passengers. Its passenger seats are modernly furnished and offer comfortable facilities. This flexibility means that the MAN Lion's Intercity LE can even be used as a coach for long-distance travel.

Four model versions were authentically implemented for this OMSI 2 add-on. A number of variants are possible here through SETVAR settings. Among other things, door designs (interior swinging doors, exterior swinging doors and sliding doors), seat layouts, interior and exterior mirrors, lights and destination displays. can be configured. Documents from the manufacturer served as a template.

Features:
  • Solo buses in different versions:
    • Intercity LE 12 (intercity / single door front)
    • Intercity LE 12 (city)
    • Intercity LE 13 (intercity / single door front)
    • Intercity LE 13 (city)
  • Different door versions
  • Interior and exterior mirror versions
  • Different seat versions (city and intercity) including folding seats
  • Narrow and wide rear destination display
  • Different rear lights
  • Numerous SETVAR adjustment options
  • LED daytime running light with dimming function from the indicator
  • Detailed new MAN dashboard with numerous functions
  • Electric driver window
  • Various engine configurations from 280 hp to 360 hp
  • Two different transmissions: Voith DIWA6 and ZF Ecolife 2
  • Including repaints for well-known free- and payware maps
  • High-resolution repaint templates included

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-Core, e.g. Core i5 with 2.8 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card with at least 2,048 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Safety, flexibility and comfort - The MAN Lion's Intercity LE is a real all-rounder and comes in different variants for OMSI 2!
